Patent Information.Abstract: The invention relates to a molecule comprising at least the amino acid sequence X1 X2 X3 X4 X5 X6 W X8 X9 X10 wherein X4,6,9 is any amino acid residue, X1 is I, L or V, X2 is not C, X3 is A, E, Q, R or Y, X5 is not R, X8 is I or L, X10 is not H and wherein said molecule have a length of from about 10 to about 100 amino acid residues or an analogue thereof. The invention also relates to compositions comprising said molecule and use of the molecule and/or composition of the invention to combat microorganisms, such as bacteria, viruses, fungi, including yeast, and parasites.
